MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW8 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Weaverham, Cuddington, Acton Bridge and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are still working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of additional materials required to complete repairs to  grounded overhead lines near to the A49 caused by third party damage. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.59PM on 15th October 2020.
